p: Decreased white blood cell and platelet counts are more frequently observed in DENV infection than in other febrile diseases [ 3]. While an inverse correlation between NS1 antigen levels and the WBC nadir had been described in Sri Lankan patients [ 36], no significant difference in SD Bioline Dengue Duo NS1 positivity was detected between acute phase patient samples with WBC and PLT counts above and below the respective lower reference values in our study.
